Module Configuration.Name: Max Chain Length
Module Configuration.Description: Maximum number of samples to evaluate per chain per generation.

Module Configuration.Name: Burn In
Module Configuration.Description: Specifies the number of preliminary MCMC steps before samples are being drawn. This may reduce effects from improper initialization.

Module Configuration.Name: Rejection Levels
Module Configuration.Description: Controls the number of accept-reject stages per MCMC step.

Module Configuration.Name: Use Adaptive Sampling
Module Configuration.Description: Specifies if covariance matrix of the proposal distribution is calculated from the samples.

Module Configuration.Name: Non Adaption Period
Module Configuration.Description: Number of steps (after Burn In steps) during which the initial standard deviation is used (only relevant for Adaptive Sampling). If 0 is specified, Korali will set this value to $5%$ of the Chain Length.

Module Configuration.Name: Chain Covariance Scaling
Module Configuration.Description: Multiplier inside of Chain Covariance update in order to control the covariance.

Variables Configuration.Name: Initial Mean
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the Initial Mean of the proposal distribution.

Variables Configuration.Name: Initial Standard Deviation
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the Standard Deviation for each variable. The proposal distribution is defined through a covariance matrix with the variance of the variables in its diagonal.

Internal Settings.Name: Cholesky Covariance
Internal Settings.Description: Cholesky Decomposition of Covariance for sampling (using a lower triangular matrix, with rest zeros).

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Cholesky Covariance
Internal Settings.Description: Chain Cholesky Decomposition of Covariance for sampling (using a lower triangular matrix, with rest zeros).

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Leader LogLikelihood
Internal Settings.Description: The logLikelihood of the current sample.

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Candidate Parameters
Internal Settings.Description: Current (theta) parameters of the chain leader sample.

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Candidates LogLikelihoods
Internal Settings.Description: The logLikelihoods of the chain candidates.

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Candidates LogPriors
Internal Settings.Description: The logPriors of the chain candidates.

Internal Settings.Name: Rejection Alphas
Internal Settings.Description: Alphas for recursive calculation of delayed rejection schemes.

Internal Settings.Name: Current Rejection Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of rejections in the current generation.

Internal Settings.Name: Database Entry Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of accepted samples stored in the database.

Internal Settings.Name: Sample Parameters Database
Internal Settings.Description: Variable values of samples stored in the database.

Internal Settings.Name: Sample Fitness Database
Internal Settings.Description: Fitness of the samples stored in the database.

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Mean
Internal Settings.Description: Mean of Markov Chain Monte Carlo Chain.
